head.supplied: Memorandum ¶ Melbourne ¶ Botanical Museum ¶ 24 Aug. 1864. ¶ ¶ We the undersigned unpacked on the 8th of August two boxes of dried plants which were sent from the Royal Gardens of Kew to the botanical...

div.p: From Carl Wilhelmi and Theodor Mueller
RBG Kew, Kew correspondence, Australia, Mueller, 1858-70, f. 148.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Enclosed with M to G. Bentham, 25 August 1864. Memorandum

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: We the undersigned unpacked on the 8th of August two boxes of dried plants which were sent from the Royal Gardens of Kew to the botanical Museum of Melbourne, the contents of one of the boxes being very much damaged by ingress of water vize:

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
One parcel of Algerian and Teneriffa
German name of Teneriffe.
plants totally destroyed and one also of Teneriffa plants much damaged.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

cell.p: One parcel of Uncinia all plants mildewed

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.278in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.278in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.278in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.278in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0.028in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 48pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.25in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.25in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 48pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.p: more or less destroyed by mildew.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: and one parcel containing, Flemingia, Vigna, Atylosia, Rynchosia and Pycnospora, also much damaged by mildew.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
